```{r init}
#| include: false
#! cache: false
projectIds <- c("Amstetten" = "155713", "Graz" = "148063", "Industrieviertel" = "156486", "Innsbruck" = "156501", "Klagenfurt" = "148013", "Krems" = "147007", "Gesäuse" = "148580", "Neusiedlersee" = "154309", "Demo" = "27173")
obsResultsList <- list()
for(i in 1:length(projectIds)){
  tempResult <- loadObs(projectIds[i])
  if(!is.null(tempResult)){
    write_csv(tempResult, paste0("data/obs_", projectIds[i], ".csv"))
    obsResultsList[[i]] <- tempResult
  }
}
obsResults <- bind_rows(obsResultsList)
```

```{r CompareProjects}
#| label: fig-projects
#| fig-cap: "Anzahl der Beobachtungen in den einzelnen Projekt Regionen"

obsResults |>
  group_by(project.name) |>
  summarise(n = n()) |>
  ggplot(
    aes(x = reorder(project.name, n), y = n, fill = project.name)
    ) +
  geom_bar(stat = "identity", show.legend = FALSE) +
  coord_flip() +
  labs(x = "", y = "Anzahl der Beobachtungen")+
  theme(
    panel.grid.major.x = element_line()
  )
```
